Program Overview 概要

Visit the Program page for more detail. 詳細はProgramをご覧ください．

Day Morning (10:00~12:00) Lunch Time (12:00~13:30) Afternoon (13:30~17:30) Afterhours
6th (Sun) Opening remarks, Invited talk Virtual lunch Author talks 1, 2, 3, Coffee Break, Invited talk  
9th (Wed) Keynotes Virtual lunch Invited talk, WiML, Invited talk Banquet
12th (Sat) Keynotes Virtual lunch Author talks 1, 2, 3, Coffee break, Invited talk
